articles.description: Android 12 vs. Android 11: Here are the major differences between Google's new OS and the prior version, including security updates and new notifications.
articles.content:
Andrew Hoyle/CNET
Google unveiled the latest version of its Android operating system last month, Android 12. Available now as a developer preview, Android 12 appears to be pretty similar to Android … [+2536 chars]
